Name: Stele for the deceased Entumuttayesbaket
Description: Round-topped funerary stele divided in three sections. In the round top, the winged solar-disk flanked by two uraei is shown; in the central section, the deceased is represented with her arms held up in adoration in front of the images of the goddesses Isis and Nephthys and the gods Osiris and Ra. The third section has three lines of text.
